On February 11, 2020 the World Health Organization announced an official name for the disease that is causing the 2019 novel coronavirus outbreak, first identified in Wuhan China. The new name of this disease is coronavirus disease 2019, abbreviated as coronavirus. In coronavirus, ‘CO’ stands for ‘corona,’ ‘VI’ for ‘virus,’ and ‘D’ for disease. Formerly, this disease was referred to as 2019 novel coronavirus

responses: Is it highly advisable to get vaccinated as soon as possible from your nearest authorized vaccine center or hospital. coronavirus Vaccines are Safe, Effective and provides a safer way to help build protection. Is it safe to order from Amazon during the pandemic?
Is it safe to accept package delivery during Covid-19
responses: Although the virus can survive for a short period on some surfaces, it is unlikely to be spread from domestic or international mail, products or packaging. However, it may be possible that people can get coronavirus by touching a surface or object that has the virus on it and then touching their own mouth, nose, or possibly their eyes. Thoroughly Sanitize packages before bringing them into the household.
